item.title: Freewallet Ethereum Wallet Now Available for iOS Platform - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Freewallet Ethereum Wallet Now Available for iOS Platform - NEWSBTC

Freewallet has announced the launch of its Ethereum wallet on Apple iOS mobile platform. Read more... Freewallet's Ethereum wallet is now available for Apple ( NASDAQ : AAPL) iPhone users. The company known for its mobile first cryptocurrency wallet had its Ethereum wallet available only on Google ( NASDAQ : GOOG - listed as Alphabet Inc.)

item.title: CEO of Steemit: Blockchain-Based Social Media Gives People Their Freedom Back
item.description:
CEO of Steemit: Blockchain-Based Social Media Gives People Their Freedom Back

Founders of Steemit, a platform rewarding its users for creating and curating content, believe that blockchain technology can be applied to social media. Forklog discussed the idea of leveraging the technology behind bitcoin for social media applications with Ned Scott, Steemit Co-founder and CEO.

item.title: EB139 - Martin Köppelmann: Gnosis - The Ethereum Prediction Market
item.description:
EB139 - Martin Köppelmann: Gnosis - The Ethereum Prediction Market

Few things arouse excitment among free market believers and enthusiasts of decentralization as prediction markets do. By allowing people to bet on any range of outcomes they promise more efficient markets and better information. Few people have worked with as much dedication on making the promise of prediction markets a reality as Martin Köppelmann.

item.title: Belgian Authority Warns Against Using OneCoin
item.description:
Belgian Authority Warns Against Using OneCoin

The Belgian Financial Services and Markets Authority has issued a warning about a lesser-known altcoin called OneCoin, to the effect that certain OneCoin promoters are lying about their recognition and relationship with the Belgian authority. A press briefing published on their website reads, in part: Certain people have recently been promoting OneCoin, said to be a virtual currency based on cryptography, in Belgium.

item.title: US Refused To Prosecute HSBC Over Fears Of "Global Financial Disaster"
item.description:
US Refused To Prosecute HSBC Over Fears Of "Global Financial Disaster"

What had previously only been hinted by the likes of former US attorney general Eric Holder became fact when a US Congressional report found that US officials refused to prosecute HSBC for money laundering in 2012 because of concerns within the DOJ that it would cause a "global financial disaster."

item.title: Blockchain Coders Win Grant to Fix Smart Contracts With 'Legalese' - CoinDesk
item.description:
Blockchain Coders Win Grant to Fix Smart Contracts With 'Legalese' - CoinDesk

The mantra 'move fast and break things' may work well in traditional software, but as the demise of The DAO illustrated, the approach may not be right for experimental financial technologies.

item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 07/12/2016 - Watch Out for a Breakout! - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price could be due for a strong break out of its consolidation pattern, but traders still seem to be undecided which way to push. item.title: Is one problem with Ethereum is that there's no clear way to know that two similar smart contracts are fungible?
item.description:
Is one problem with Ethereum is that there's no clear way to know that two similar smart contracts are fungible?

Hey! It was summertime and together with a friend of mine, we decided to make an experiment and it consisted in knowing new people everyday, with an average of 2 per day. So we approached strangers on the beach, into the bars, in the streets of the city and in the dance floors.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH Facing Tough Resistance - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH Facing Tough Resistance - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price after weakening started trading in a range. It looks like it is facing a tough resistance on the upside, which is stalling gains. Ethereum price after weakening started trading in a range. It looks like it is facing a tough resistance on the upside, which is stalling gains.

item.title: What are the top 10 most exciting blockchain startups?
item.description:
What are the top 10 most exciting blockchain startups?

My father had died ten months earlier, at the age of 94. Now, my mother was going, at the age of 92. My wife and I traveled to Massachusetts to see her for what we knew was the last time. My dad had been my opposite: Moody, grumpy, bigoted, isolated, non-communicative.
